lyrics:
12 contributorsslide lyricsintro
this is another missy elliott exclusive

verse 1 missy
my twinkies look stinky on the benz
and dont i gotta look sweet for my mens

now fake a take and make em holler at ya later
shake em wake em tell em what to get my ass from jacobs

tell you who the motherfucking boss is
im driving you walking thats why you talking
see the chrome spinning on the wheels stop jocking
ima let you know real nice and slow
id be broke as a joke if i had to be a ho
so poor missy on the rise like the sun
if you think that im done i aint even begun

never cheap underground like the streets
